When method get
http call failed after 668 milliseconds for url: http://localhost:8080/normal/webapi/all
classpath:com/api/automation/getRequest/karateJsonpath.feature:9

steps.name: def jobTitles = karate.jsonPath(response,"$[?(@.jobId > 10)].jobTitle")
comments: #Below expression evaluates the response and filters out those objects in the response array which have
# jobId greater than 10 and stores the jobTitle values in a variable

steps.name: match jobTitles == '#?_.length > 1'
comments: #Below we are validating that jobTitles array received in the previous step has size more than 1

name: com/api/automation/getRequest/karateJsonpath.feature
description: Use of json path in karate framework
